channel.title: Modern Warfare 3
channel.description: Hey guys.. As most of you know, MW3 will be coming out on 11-8-11 and I'm really excited. I hear they are bringing quickscoping back and I do nothing but quickscope on MW2 so yeah, that makes me excited. What do you guys think about MW3? Post anything you know might be in it and your opinion on it.

item.title: Modern Warfare 3
item.dc:creator: @CreatorAlex CreatorAlex
item.description:
@CreatorAlex wrote:

First one to start to Battlefield 3 thread wins!

I like Battlefield 100x more, though I don’t hate Call of Duty.

[hr]

List of threads to be started:

Battlefield 3
Halo CE Remake
Assassin’s Creed Revelations
Halo 4

[hr][hr]

I’m off to try and make my cloud servers work. (So far I’ve only had one fire!)

Read full topic

[/quote]

item.description:

[quote=“reyx7, post:31, topic:406628”]Cod4 campaign sucked? That campaign was AMAZING!
It was so dark and evil… the nuke that killed Jackson, the ghillie in the mist… that was one of the greatest campaigns in all of call of duty, and I think everyone else would agree.[/quote]

item.title: Modern Warfare 3
item.dc:creator: @Mr_Mopar1 Mr Mopar
item.description:
@Mr_Mopar1 wrote:

[quote=“gravenfire23, post:25, topic:406628”][quote author=rdelta_ link=topic=503628.msg3686820#msg3686820 date=1311897576]
I like quickscoping, it’s all I do. Black Ops online sucked, zombies is retarded, love wager matches though

Modern Warfare 2 online sucked, all campaigns suck, special ops sucks, private quickscope/trickshot matches are the bomb.
Modern Warfare 1 online was great, all campaigns suck, private matches sucked on there.

W@W is 200% retarded
[/quote]The campaigns for all of the games were great and the fact that you enjoy quickscoping and think that general multi-player sucks means that you have never played a real fps. the point of a sniper is long range accurate shots not rushing in on people with it? all of the games in the call of duty series should not even be considered fps as there infested with 12 year old kids who run around with sniper rifles.[/quote]
All fps’s are filled with 12 year old’s these days…

Read full topic

item.title: Modern Warfare 3
item.dc:creator: @xxlukexx xxlukexx
item.description:
@xxlukexx wrote:

[quote=“demps2k9, post:21, topic:406628”]Modern Warfare has to have special ops otherwise to me, it isn’t going to be as good. Special ops was really good and I enjoyed spending a few hours every day for about a week just getting 3 stars on every level.

For the map packs they should definetly bring back shipment. It was so ownage.[/quote]

They are but I heard its totally different + its CO-OP.

people liked CoD4 over WAW and always have

item.title: Modern Warfare 3
item.dc:creator: @Vexillum Vexillum
item.description:
@Vexillum wrote:

[quote=“TabbyKiller, post:8, topic:406628”][quote author=noobs are ftw link=topic=503628.msg3684466#msg3684466 date=1311756714]
i hate quickscopers they can go screw themselves lol yet i still prefer mw2 over black ops
[/quote]
Idk how Quick Scoping can bother you… w/o Sleight of Hand the odds are a Quick Scoper would get killed is 50/50 if not 60/40[/quote]

I’ve seen the trailer and promo, tell me when the montage comes out.

[quote=“Tom_BETA, post:13, topic:406628”][quote author=Vexillum link=topic=503628.msg3684491#msg3684491 date=1311758485]

i hate quickscopers they can go screw themselves lol yet i still prefer mw2 over black ops

Why? Lol, quickscoping takes more skill than shooting a regular gun. Even though machine guns are the point of the game, quickscoping really is fun.
[/quote]

It ruins to vibe of the game, everyone else is playing properly then you get the select few people who start jumping around the map, while venting their frustration via headset because they can’t even play the game.

If people want to start showing of their ninja moves, then buy a sodding ninja game.

@MW3: I’m looking forward to this game, I never really got into BO (Zombies was alright) but I did enjoy MW2. Though I’m looking forward to battlefield more :|[/quote]

Yeah, your right it does somewhat ruin the vibe of the game… But the players of COD are creative, and they invented quickscoping, which is now a part of COD.

Read full topic
